## Agenda


- Central Limit Theorem
- Hypothesis Testing
- Example: Goal-Setting in Organizations



## References

[Brian Caffo. 2015. Statistical Inference for Data Science. LeanPub.](https://leanpub.com/LittleInferenceBook)

[Khan Academy. Inferential Statistics](https://www.khanacademy.org/math/probability/statistics-inferential)


## Assignment

Pick a topic from your own team paper:  
(or pick an R dataset of your choice)

- Define a set of hypotheses ($H_0$ and $H_a$)
- Visualize the group samples with a chart (e.g. boxplot)
- Perform a formal hypothesis test (t-test, ANOVA)
- Describe the results in plain language
